The question was asked: "What influence are you bringing into the Lord's work by following such a course? You use time and money to impede the work already started. Might not this time and money be better employed? If you had striven to fulfill the commission given by Christ, if you had acted like sensible men, as Christ would have acted in their 


                               -271- 

place, lines of work that would have glorified God might have been started and advanced in many places. But you have turned from the instruction given Christ.
